sub_title: Rotarian | District Rotary Foundation Chair (DRFC) | Member Rotary – IHE Delft Scholarship Committee |
summary: Retired Energy Professional with 34+ years’ experience in Technical & Leadership roles in Exploration & Development as well as Subsurface Learning. Active in community and humanitarian projects through membership of Rotary International since 1999.
